participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and outgoing, enjoys socializing and being involved in activities.
participant_1.background: I am a high school student. I make straight As. I am in the band. I eat healthy. I am very social.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys simple pleasures and spending time with his dog.
participant_2.background: I live in a house in California. I currently work at Target. Every day after work I buy my dog a dog biscuit. I am 5'7" tall. I try to take a break and see a movie in theaters every other month.

content.text: I see you live in California, do you enjoy the weather?
It's not bad but it is hot right now.
I know what you mean, I live in the Midwest and it is very hot right now.
How hot does it get there?
It can get up to 90 degrees Fahrenheit.
Wow, that's hot! It gets to around 80 degrees Fahrenheit here but it feels much hotter because of the humidity.
I know what you mean, the humidity can make it feel even hotter.
Do you like living in the Midwest?
I do, I love the seasons and the people are very friendly.
That's good to hear. I like the people here but I don't really like the weather.
Well, I'm glad you're happy here.
Thanks! I'm glad you're happy in the Midwest too.
Thanks!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to do those things too.
What's your favorite movie?
I don't really have a favorite movie, I like a lot of different kinds of movies.
Me too. I like action movies, comedy movies, and horror movies.
I like those too. I also like romantic comedies and animated movies.
Those are good too. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of video games, but I mostly like action games and role-playing games.
Me too. I like those types of games too.
We should play video games together sometime.
I would love to!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good!
